verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14331'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
verses.translation: Когда свернется (и погаснет) солнце

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14332'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُجُومُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14333'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14334'>نك</tajweed>َدَرَتْ
verses.translation: Когда, (теряя блеск свой), распадутся звезды

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14211'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
verses.translation: Когда, (подобно миражу), Придут в движенье и исчезнут горы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14335'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
verses.translation: Когда верблюдицы, несущие во чреве последний месяц, Будут без присмотра

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14336'>ٱ</tajweed>لْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: Когда в стада собьются звери (без разделения на виды)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14337'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: Когда набухнут и прольются все моря

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14338'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
verses.translation: Когда распределятся души (по заслугам)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14339'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَوْءُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed>دَةُ سُئِلَتْ
verses.translation: Когда зарытую живьем младенца-девочку воспросят

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بِأَىِّ ذَ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':14340'>نۢب</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14341'>ٍ ق</tajweed>ُتِلَتْ
verses.translation: За грех какой она была убита

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14342'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: Когда раскрыты будут свитки (записей добра и зла)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14210'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ كُشِطَتْ
verses.translation: И обнажится небо

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14343'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
verses.translation: И разожжен огонь бушующего Ада будет

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14344'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
verses.translation: Когда приближен будет Рай

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَلِمَتْ نَفْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':10644'>سٌ م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَحْضَرَتْ
verses.translation: (Тогда) познает каждая душа, Что было ею уготовано вперед

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13287'>قْ</tajweed>سِمُ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14345'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َسِ
verses.translation: Но нет! В знак отступающих планет

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱلْجَوَارِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14346'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َسِ
verses.translation: Которые восходят (при закате) И исчезают (при восходе солнца)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
verses.translation: В знак все темнеющего крова ночи

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صُّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14092'>بْ</tajweed>حِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
verses.translation: И в знак зари, что выдыхает свет

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لَقَوْلُ رَسُو<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13904'>لٍ ك</tajweed>َر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.translation: Сие, поистине, принесено Достойным вестником (Аллаха)

verses.text_uthmani: ذِى قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِى ٱلْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ذِى قُوَّةٍ عِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':264'>ند</tajweed>َ ذِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7769'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَرْشِ مَك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.translation: Кому у Властелина Трона даны и сила, и почет

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مُّطَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14347'>عٍ ث</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ أَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.translation: Кому дано повелевать И верным быть перед доверием Его

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا صَاحِبُك<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':14348'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِمَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13812'>جْ</tajweed>ن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نٍ
verses.translation: (О люди!) Ваш собрат неодержим

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> رَءَاهُ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12961'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأُفُقِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14349'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Ведь, истинно, он лицезрел его на ясном горизонте

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2453'>ٱ</tajweed>لْغَيْبِ بِضَن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.translation: И не скупится он (вам передать Весть) о Незримом

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':7213'>نٍ ر</tajweed>َّج<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā huwa biqauli syaiṭānir rajīm(in).
verses.translation: Сие - не проповедь гонимого (камнями) Сатаны

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Куда ж идете вы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6839'>رٌ ل</tajweed>ِّلْعَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Поистине, посланье это - увещевание мирам

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لِمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14095'>ن ش</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':344'>نك</tajweed>ُمْ أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14350'>َن ي</tajweed>َسْتَق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مَ
verses.translation: Тем, кто идти желает праведным путем

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا تَش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُونَ إِلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4201'>َن ي</tajweed>َش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4334'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ رَبُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4750'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā tasyā'ūna illā ay yasyā'allāhu rabbul-'ālamīn(a).
verses.translation: Но не дано вам ничего желать, Пока Аллах, Владыка всех миров, не повелит вам это
